name: Prizensta - Raffle Assistant for Instagram
description: Prizensta is for anyone who needs Assistant for Instagram Giveaway Raffles, who wants to find out unfollowers and who wants to increase their followers!  Are you running raffles on Instagram? Prizensta will help you to find participants of the raffle automatically and safe!  Find winners in most fair way! See your followers increase!  Publish your campaign photo or video on Instagram, then open Prizensta and select that post!  Prizensta offers you the most engaging rules: Follow your account, like campaign photo, like extra photos, tag friends in comment and much more....  Prizensta finds everyday your participants automatically and notifies you. You can see participants of any campaign whenever you want.  See who have unfollowed you as long as you have Prizensta Premium (even when you do not have raffle).  You can create unlimited campaigns as long as you have Prizensta Premium.  You can see some raffle results of Prizensta users on our Instagram account @prizensta.  If you have any questions, please contact us at hello@dreamious.com.  Prizensta offers you weekly and monthly subscription packages and you will have 3 days to try Prizensta Premium for free!  Subscription packages are fixed price and not related to your follower count.  Terms of Use: https://prizenstaraffle.app/termsofuse Privacy Policy: https://prizenstaraffle.app/privacypolicy  Disclaimer: Prizensta is not affiliated with or funded by Instagram.com, Inc in any way.
